title: Microsoft Windows 10 Clean Installation Manual.txt
description:
*** Disclaimer: Make sure to back up your data before proceeding, as I will not be held responsible for anything that goes wrong with the upgrade & clean installation process of Microsoft Windows 10. ***

This torrent includes just a basic text file explaining how to do the so-called "clean install" of Microsoft Windows 10, without waiting for Windows Update whatsoever.

It applies only to those who were offered free upgrades to this awesome software, but includes everything you need to know, including:

* Official download links to the Windows 10 software itself

* Complete step-by-step instructions on how to do a clean install of Windows 10 without entering a product key.

The full version of this manual with screenshots can be found at my personal website, Jayl.ee: http://jayl.ee/blog/2015/07/29/microsoft-windows-10-clean-installation-manual

Feel free to ask any questions in the comments section of my blog post and I will do my best to answer them in a timely manner
